data.lyric:
[ti:Love Someone]
[ar:Brett Eldredge]
[al:Brett Eldredge]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Love Someone - Brett Eldredge
[00:16.05]Written by：Brett Eldredge/Ross Copperman/Heather Morgan
[00:32.10]Oh baby would you look right there
[00:34.81]The way the sun is hitting your hair
[00:37.60]The way the world just stopped right here
[00:39.96]In mid air I don't ever wanna move
[00:43.16]You put the cool in the breeze
[00:45.84]You put the weak here in my knees
[00:48.62]You put me right where I'm supposed to be
[00:50.69]In your blue eyed sea
[00:52.12]And I wanna sail away
[00:54.85]'Cause when I wake up in the middle of the night
[00:58.45]You're holding me so tight
[01:01.25]Take whole of me my oh my
[01:03.51]Sure feels good to love someone
[01:06.59]When you laugh at the way I dance
[01:09.37]When you smile when you hold my hand
[01:12.09]I look at you and I understand
[01:14.65]Sure feels good to love someone
[01:18.05]
[01:27.31]You knock me out kiss by kiss
[01:30.08]I need you baby sip by sip
[01:32.83]Sit back and let me drink you in
[01:34.94]I'm falling to you
[01:36.68]Over and over and over again
[01:39.15]When I wake up in the middle of the night
[01:42.57]You're holding me so tight
[01:45.36]Take whole of me my oh my
[01:47.73]Sure feels good to love someone
[01:50.71]When you laugh at the way I dance
[01:53.54]When you smile when you hold my hand
[01:56.19]I look at you and I understand
[01:58.74]Sure feels good to love someone
[02:02.23]
[02:12.87]Everywhere I want to go and
[02:15.78]Everywhere I want to be at
[02:18.50]Everywhere I've ever been
[02:20.59]
[02:21.12]Everything I'll ever need
[02:23.25]Is sitting right here next to me
[02:26.08]When I wake up in the middle of the night
[02:29.51]You're holding me so tight
[02:32.26]Take whole of me my oh my
[02:34.54]Sure feels good to love someone
[02:37.58]When you laugh at the way I dance
[02:40.39]When you smile when you hold my hand
[02:43.11]I look at you and I understand
[02:45.63]Sure feels good to love someone
[02:49.14]
[02:50.38]Sure feels good
data.trans:
[ti:Love Someone]
[ar:Brett Eldredge]
[al:Brett Eldredge]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:16.05]//
[00:32.10]宝贝 能不能看过来
[00:34.81]阳光洒在你的头发上
[00:37.60]时间仿佛停止了
[00:39.96]我希望时间永远停在这里
[00:43.16]你带来凉爽微风
[00:45.84]你让我双膝发软
[00:48.62]你让我找到了自己的归属
[00:50.69]在你温柔的眼波里
[00:52.12]我想扬帆远航
[00:54.85]因为当我在深夜醒来
[00:58.45]你把我紧紧拥在怀里
[01:01.25]让我感动不已
[01:03.51]爱一个人当然是无限美好
[01:06.59]你会笑话我跳舞的姿态
[01:09.37]当你拉着我的手 微微一笑
[01:12.09]我望着你 我明白
[01:14.65]爱一个人当然是无限美好
[01:18.05]
[01:27.31]你的每一个吻都让我神魂颠倒
[01:30.08]我想和你细水长流 宝贝
[01:32.83]坐好别动 让我好好欣赏你的美
[01:34.94]我爱上了你
[01:36.68]彻底爱上了你
[01:39.15]当我在深夜醒来
[01:42.57]你把我紧紧拥在怀里
[01:45.36]让我感动不已
[01:47.73]爱一个人当然是无限美好
[01:50.71]你会笑话我跳舞的姿态
[01:53.54]当你拉着我的手 微微一笑
[01:56.19]我望着你 我明白
[01:58.74]爱一个人当然是无限美好
[02:02.23]
[02:12.87]我向往的远方
[02:15.78]我期待的天堂
[02:18.50]我有过的梦想
[02:20.59]
[02:21.12]我需要的一切
[02:23.25]都在我的身旁 触手可及
[02:26.08]当我在深夜醒来
[02:29.51]你把我紧紧拥在怀里
[02:32.26]让我感动不已
[02:34.54]爱一个人当然是无限美好
[02:37.58]你会笑话我跳舞的姿态
[02:40.39]当你拉着我的手 微微一笑
[02:43.11]我望着你 我明白
[02:45.63]爱一个人当然是无限美好
[02:49.14]
[02:50.38]当然是无限美好
